decision_conditions: Prior to the commencement of the development the applicant shall liaise with the RBK Highways Streetworks Team (NRSWA) over necessary temporary restrictions on the highways to prevent parking as set out in Appendix A Temporary On-Street Parking Restrictions of the Construction Management Plan hereby approved. The development shall only commence when the Temporary On-Street Parking Restrictions have been implemented and they shall continue for a period of time previously agreed in writing with the RBK Highways Team prior to the commencement of the development. https://www.kingston.gov.uk/highway-licencesReason : in the interests of highway safety and the free movement of traffic
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
